intro: Otosma aethiopica, commonly known as the Ethiopian otosma, is a flowering plant native to Ethiopia. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes many shrubs and herbs. The plant is characterized by its small, clustered flowers that range in color from white to pink. Its leaves are typically opposite and oval-shaped with a slightly hairy surface. Otosma aethiopica is often found in rocky or mountainous regions, where it thrives in well-drained soils.
